product_name: adidas Terrex Swift Hollow Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Raise your performance with the adidas Terra Swift Hollow Fleece Jacket. The Climawarm+ Thermolite fabric is so good at evaporating sweat and keeping you warm, you'll be ready for anything.
short_description: Raise your performance with the adidas Terra Swift Hollow Fleece Jacket. The Climawarm+ Thermolite fabric is so good at evaporating sweat and keeping you warm, you'll be ready for anything.
